评论详情: Gets tangled up a bit, but with three strands, its expected.
And it tangles way too easily!

Absolutely love this necklace. I've gotten a ton of compliments. It's sturdy. And doesn't lose its color or flake when I bathed and showered with it. It can tangle but that's common for multi piece necklaces. Just take it off gently. Lay it down and rearrange it.
The way it was strung together makes it almost impossible to wear without it instantly getting tangled together. It's cute but not worth the hassle of untangling every 10 minutes.
It becomes a tangled mess very quickly. I ended up removing all chains but the dainty heart
